backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing emergency services tracking with user profiles (ambulance/police roles), location tracking, SOS alerts, and authorization using MixinAuthorization; includes distance calculation, heartbeat monitoring, and phone number validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: investigating profile save errors for new ambulance users and adding comprehensive error logging to the profile creation flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and pages with details on authentication flow, GPS smoothing, real-time map updates, and error handling enhancements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables including custom emergency-red and emergency-blue colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet CSS/JS from CDN with onload/onerror handlers for load verification and setting window.leafletLoaded flag.
frontend/project_state.json: Project state file documenting known issue ISSUE-1: transient production deployment errors with retry mitigation strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component orchestrating authentication flow, profile loading, and routing between LoginPrompt, ProfileSetup, PhoneNumberCapture, AmbulanceInterface, and PoliceInterface with extensive console logging throughout.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallback.ts: Error fallback UI component displaying application crash details with technical error information and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component catching component errors and rendering CrashFallback with detailed error logging to console.
frontend/src/components/ErrorState.tsx: Displays a full-screen error state with categorized error messages (network, auth, backend), technical details in an expandable section, and retry/reload buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header showing the Emergency Response branding, user profile with role badge, logout button, and controls for sharing app links and domain info.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog component that displays the current app URL, explains custom domain setup requirements, and provides troubleshooting tips for production deployment failures.
Simple full-screen loading spinner component with an optional message, used as a fallback during async operations.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity, displaying ambulance and police role icons.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberCaptu: Form for capturing and validating a 10-digit phone number for existing users who need to update their profile, preserving existing name and role.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form for new users to enter name, phone number (with validation), and select role (ambulance/police), with categorized error handling for authorization, validation, and network issues.
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Leaflet-based real-time map component that displays ambulance, police, and SOS markers with smooth coordinate transitions and in-place marker updates to avoid re-rendering.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Button component that copies the app share URL to clipboard with fallback UI for manual copy if clipboard API fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenInitiali: Hook that initializes admin access control once per session using a token from URL hash parameters when actor and identity are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, ambulance locations, SOS alerts, and police locations with automatic refresh intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors including emergency-specific red and blue accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance interface page with SOS trigger/deactivate functionality, GPS location tracking with accuracy filtering and smoothing, and real-time map display showing ambulance position and nearby police officers.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Police interface page displaying all ambulance locations and active SOS alerts with GPS tracking, distance calculations, filtering by online/offline status, and navigation links to Google Maps directions.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file that adds type definitions for the global Leaflet object (window.L) used for map functionality.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Utility function that constructs the full shareable URL from the current browser location including origin, pathname, search params, and hash.
frontend/src/utils/leafletMarkers.ts: Leaflet marker utilities providing icon configurations and creation functions for ambulance, police, and SOS marker types with consistent styling and sizing.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Shared constants for location update intervals (12s for ambulances, 5s for police), police radius (50m), and formatting functions for displaying distances and radii.
frontend/src/utils/locationSmoothing.ts: GPS location smoothing and filtering utilities using Haversine distance calculations, low-pass filters, accuracy thresholds, and outlier detection to reduce jitter and improve location accuracy for both map display and backend updates.
frontend/src/utils/mapsDirections.ts: Utility function that builds Google Maps directions URLs for navigation with optional origin coordinates, defaulting to user's current location if not provided.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Phone number validation utilities providing functions to validate 10-digit phone numbers, normalize input to digits only, and generate user-friendly validation error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing and management utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state across navigation and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking two features related to investigating and fixing a profile creation error for new users selecting the Ambulance Crew role, including adding comprehensive error logging to both frontend and backend.
